Terms of Service Privacy Policy 843.203.0922 SHOP GIFT CARDS STORE Fiat Lux Charleston’s premier rooftop dining This rooftop bar delights all of the senses. It’s the destination for specialty cocktails and an extensive wine list with spectacular panoramic views overlooking the Holy City. Here, sunset is best paired with a bottle of rosé. See Inside Daytime Attire - Casual dry pool or swim attire is acceptable. Shirt, swimsuit cover-ups and footwear are required. Evening Attire - Collared shirt required for gentlemen. Well-kept denim and dress shorts are acceptable. Hat Policy - Gentlemen’s hats and caps are not permitted in any of the indoor dining or bar venues. Gentlemen are permitted to wear outdoor hats at outdoor venues. Women are permitted to venue-appropriate hats prior to 5 p.m. or dressier hats before or after 5 p.m. Hours Sunday - Thursday | 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Friday - Saturday | 11:00 am - 12:00 am Food Service Daily | 11:30 am - 9:00 pm Menus Cocktails Specialty Cocktails Fireside 21 Tanqueray Gin, Campari, Carpano Antica Formula, Earl Grey, Orange, Cocoa Hotel California 21 Ten to One Dark Rum, All Spice, Banana, Coconut Pineapple, Orgeat, Nutmeg *Contains Nuts The Overlook 21 Blade and Bow, Firefly Hotel Bennett Select Bourbon Chicory, Amaretto, Apple Bitters The Grand Budapest 21 Herradura Reposado Tequila, Barsol Pisco, Grapefruit Lime, Sumac Bitters, Grapefruit Salt The Bennett 21 Hotel Bennett Select Firefly Bourbon, Lemon, Apple Cider, Maple, Honey Available Warm or On Ice Grandma's House 21 Mission Fig Infused Ketel One, Vodka, Tawny Port, Butterscotch, Orange, Chocolate The Polar Express 21 Vanilla-Infused Ketel One Vodka, Licor 45, Graham Cracker Cream, Peppermint Candy, Cinnamon Bates Motel 16 Daily Curated Punch Non-Spirited Cocktails Mary Street 16 Seedlip Garden, Tomato, Olive, Lemon, Tabasco Ann Street 16 Seedlip Spice, Apple Cider, Citrus Shrub, Ginger Beer, Cinnamon Hutson Alley 16 Graham Cracker Cream, Peppermint Candy, Cinnamon - Gluten Free | - Vegetarian | - Dairy Free | - Plant-based Vegan | - Vegan [GF] [V] [DF] [PBV] [VG] *Consuming Raw Or Undercooked Meats, Poultry, Seafood, Shellfish, Or Eggs May Increase Your Risk Of Food-Borne Illness. 20% Gratuity Added To Parties Of Six Or More Guests. All prices are quoted in USD. Wine Champagne & Sparkling (Glass | Bottle) Caposaldo, Prosecco di Valdobbiadene, Veneto, Italy (19 | 75) Raventós i Blanc, Blanc de Blanc, Catalonia, Spain, 2022 (20 | 78) Gérard Bertrand Crémant de Limoux Brut Rosé 2021 (21 | 82) Veuve Clicquot “Yellow Label”, Brut, Champagne, France (45 | 215) Whites (Glass | Bottle) Silverado, Sauvignon Blanc, Napa, California, 2023 (19 | 88) Alexana, Pinot Gris, Wallamette, Oregon, 2023 (20 | 90) Louis Latour, Mâcon-Lugny "Les Genièvres, " Burgundy France 2023 (19 | 85) Patz & Hall, Chardonnay, Sonoma, California 2021 (26 | 105) Pascal Jolivet, Attitude, Loire Valley, France, 2022 (20 | 88) Jermann, Pinot Grigio, Friuli, Italy 2023 (19 | 80) Loveblock, Sauvignon Blanc, Marlborough, New Zealand (20 | 85) Reds (Glass | Bottle) Felino, Malbec, Mendoza, Argentina, 2023 (19 | 76) Château de Saint Cosme, Côtes du Rhône, Rhône, France 2023 (18 | 72) Daou, Cabernet Sauvignon, Paso Robles, California 2022 (22 | 85) Elk Cove, Pinot Noir, Willamette, Oregon, 2023 (24 | 94) Charles Krug, Cabernet Sauvignon, Napa, California 2022 (30 | 130) Rosé (Glass | Bottle) Aveleda, Vinho Verde, Portugal, 2023 (18 | 72) Flowers, Sonoma, California 2023 (20 | 85) Château d'Esclans, Côtes de Provence, France, 2022 (27 | 110) - Gluten Free | - Vegetarian | - Dairy Free | - Plant-based Vegan | - Vegan [GF] [V] [DF] [PBV] [VG] *Consuming Raw Or Undercooked Meats, Poultry, Seafood, Shellfish, Or Eggs May Increase Your Risk Of Food-Borne Illness. 20% Gratuity Added To Parties Of Six Or More Guests. All prices are quoted in USD. Skip to main content We have updated our and , which you agree to accept by continuing to use this site. Click the links to review. Terms of Service Privacy Policy 843.203.0922 SHOP GIFT CARDS STORE Specials and Promotions View Treatment Menu (opens in a new tab) Book an Appointment Gift Cards Seasonal Spa Specials Champagne of the Sea Body Treatment Begin the New Year immersed in coastal elegance. Our signature Champagne of the Sea Body Treatment features a luminous full-body exfoliation followed by a self-warming marine mud application along the spine—melting away tension and promoting deep detoxification. The experience concludes with a complimentary glass of sparkling rosé, offering a celebratory moment of relaxation. 60 min 255.00 Holiday Fig Ritual Body & Massage Treatments 60 minutes of blissful relaxation with Fig-infused oils, melting away tension and renewing your senses – Fig & Tranquility Massage 60 min 250.00 | 90 min 345.00 Exquisite full-body exfoliation followed by a nourishing Fig oil hydration finish, leaving skin radiant and soft – Fig Renewal Body Scrub | 235.00 A sumptuous warm wrap infused with rich Fig moisturizer to envelop your body in comfort and seasonal indulgence| – Fig Body Wrap 245.00 Lowcountry Luxe CBD Stone Ritual | Seasonal Winter Exclusive Inspired by Charleston’s serene coastal winters, this deeply comforting ritual blends warmed, polished stones with Acrely’s premium full-spectrum CBD oil. Slow, intentional stonework melts away muscle tension while CBD delivers powerful calming and anti-inflammatory benefits, making it ideal for easing seasonal stress, soothing winter stiffness, and giving guests a meaningful sense of place. Optional Enhancement: Acrely Hair & Scalp Treatment — fully integrated into the 90-minute experience for nourishing scalp relaxation and softer hair. 90 min 355.00 Holy City Winter Radiance Facial | Seasonal Winter Exclusive Restore your skin during Charleston’s cool winter months with a hydrating, revitalizing facial using Omoró’s mineral-rich products. Gentle exfoliation, a nourishing mask, and a calming facial massage work together to deeply hydrate, restore glow and luminosity, and soothe sensitive or stressed skin—perfect for combating winter dryness, easing post-holiday fatigue, or enjoying a radiant seasonal reset. 60 min 250.00 Winter Serenity Weekdays Chilly Charleston days deserve extra warmth. Enjoy a complimentary hot stone enhancement with any 60+ minute massage or facial Monday–Thursday to elevate your midweek treatment.

Terms of Service Privacy Policy 843.203.0922 SHOP GIFT CARDS STORE Fiat Lux Charleston’s premier rooftop dining This rooftop bar delights all of the senses. It’s the destination for specialty cocktails and an extensive wine list with spectacular panoramic views overlooking the Holy City. Here, sunset is best paired with a bottle of rosé. See Inside Daytime Attire - Casual dry pool or swim attire is acceptable. Shirt, swimsuit cover-ups and footwear are required. Evening Attire - Collared shirt required for gentlemen. Well-kept denim and dress shorts are acceptable. Hat Policy - Gentlemen’s hats and caps are not permitted in any of the indoor dining or bar venues. Gentlemen are permitted to wear outdoor hats at outdoor venues. Women are permitted to venue-appropriate hats prior to 5 p.m. or dressier hats before or after 5 p.m. Hours Sunday - Thursday | 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Friday - Saturday | 11:00 am - 12:00 am Food Service Daily | 11:30 am - 9:00 pm Menus Cocktails Specialty Cocktails Fireside 21 Tanqueray Gin, Campari, Carpano Antica Formula, Earl Grey, Orange, Cocoa Hotel California 21 Ten to One Dark Rum, All Spice, Banana, Coconut Pineapple, Orgeat, Nutmeg *Contains Nuts The Overlook 21 Blade and Bow, Firefly Hotel Bennett Select Bourbon Chicory, Amaretto, Apple Bitters The Grand Budapest 21 Herradura Reposado Tequila, Barsol Pisco, Grapefruit Lime, Sumac Bitters, Grapefruit Salt The Bennett 21 Hotel Bennett Select Firefly Bourbon, Lemon, Apple Cider, Maple, Honey Available Warm or On Ice Grandma's House 21 Mission Fig Infused Ketel One, Vodka, Tawny Port, Butterscotch, Orange, Chocolate The Polar Express 21 Vanilla-Infused Ketel One Vodka, Licor 45, Graham Cracker Cream, Peppermint Candy, Cinnamon Bates Motel 16 Daily Curated Punch Non-Spirited Cocktails Mary Street 16 Seedlip Garden, Tomato, Olive, Lemon, Tabasco Ann Street 16 Seedlip Spice, Apple Cider, Citrus Shrub, Ginger Beer, Cinnamon Hutson Alley 16 Graham Cracker Cream, Peppermint Candy, Cinnamon - Gluten Free | - Vegetarian | - Dairy Free | - Plant-based Vegan | - Vegan [GF] [V] [DF] [PBV] [VG] *Consuming Raw Or Undercooked Meats, Poultry, Seafood, Shellfish, Or Eggs May Increase Your Risk Of Food-Borne Illness. 20% Gratuity Added To Parties Of Six Or More Guests.
